name: United Way
description: The Trump Foundation gave most of its money to traditional philanthropic causes, including the United Way, a handful of schools, and more than 10 museums.

stories.description: The Trump Foundation gave most of its money to traditional philanthropic causes, including the United Way, a handful of schools, and more than 10 museums.
stories.headline: Where Did Trump's Foundation Donate Its Money? IRS Documents Reveal Surprising Answers
